sentence.Network_en: They make no secret of their leftist sympathies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们毫不掩饰自己对左派的同情。

sentence.Network_en: Activists pasted up posters criticizing the leftist leaders.
sentence.Network_cn: 激进分子张贴起海报批评左翼领袖。

sentence.Network_en: But we must not think of Chekhov as a leftist, much less a revolutionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是我们绝不应把契科夫看成是个左派人物，他更不是革命者。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 左字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 左轮手枪，左轮〖 revolver〗 左派〖 theLeft;leftist〗 左撇子〖 left-hander〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... leftism 左翼主义 leftist 左翼的人 leftlaid 左搓的.
Even an editorial in Monde , a leftist daily , has applauded Mr Sarkozy ., 甚至连一位来自左翼派日报 < 法国世界报 > 的一篇报导也对萨科齐先生表示赞扬.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... left wing 左翼 leftist 左派分子 liberalism 自由主义.

list.abs: parties Hugo Chávez , Venezuela's leftist president , won a narrow majority of the vote in the country's legislative election .在委内瑞拉的立委选举中，左翼总统乌戈?查韦斯的反对党险胜。
more of them favour the market economy , and most take a dim view of Hugo Chávez , Venezuela's radical leftist president .他们大多数支持市场经济，而且多数对于委内瑞拉激进左派总统HugoChávez采取悲观看法。

左倾树(leftist tree)体现了一种不平衡的美。平衡树我们接触过不少，平衡的树可以使深度保持很小而左偏树可以看成是AVL的对偶， …
those leftists , holding a slim majority in the two years' existence of the National Constituent Assembly , did a remarkable job .那些左派人士，在成为国民制宪大会上微弱多数派的两年中，他们的工资非常出色。
for new leftists has always been the countryside , which they point as a prime example of market-economy failures .农村始终是新左派尤为关注的一块领域，他们视之为市场经济失败的最佳实例。
human rights are also something new leftists bring up very often .新左翼分子也不常提及人权。

entry.tran: （社会主义者、共产主义者等）左派成员，左派人士
entry.def: Socialists and Communists are sometimes referred to as leftists.

example.ex: Two of the men were leftists and two were centrists.
example.tran: 这些人中，有两位是左派，有两位是中间派。

entry.tran: 左派的；社会主义思想的；共产主义思想的
entry.def: If you describe someone, their ideals, or their activities as leftist, you mean that they support the ideas of socialism or communism.

example.ex: They make no secret of their leftist sympathies.
example.tran: 他们毫不掩饰自己对左派的同情。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who belongs to the political left
1. believing in or supporting tenets of the political left
